hole_1.original_tactic:
calc
  (A - M * X) * M = A * M - M * X * M := by rw [Matrix.sub_mul] <;> simp [Matrix.mul_assoc]
  _ = M * B - M * X * M := by rw [hmul]
  _ = M * (B - X * M) := by rw [Matrix.mul_sub] <;> simp [Matrix.mul_assoc] <;> ring

hole_2.original_tactic:
calc
  (A - M * X).det * M.det = ((A - M * X) * M).det := by rw [Matrix.det_mul]
  _ = (M * (B - X * M)).det := by rw [h₁]
  _ = M.det * (B - X * M).det := by rw [Matrix.det_mul]

hole_3.error_message:
Lean error:
tactic 'aesop' failed, made no progress
Initial goal:
  n : ℕ
  A B M X : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ
  npos : 0 < n
  hmul : A * M = M * B
  hpoly : A.charpoly = B.charpoly
  h₁ : (A - M * X) * M = M * (B - X * M)
  hM : M.det = 0
  ⊢ (A - M * X).det = (B - X * M).det
hole_3.original_tactic:
rw [hM] at h₅
simp at h₅
simp_all [Matrix.det_fin_zero]
aesop
